About Me

I am a web developer with two years of experience building production applications with Ruby on Rails. Computers and software have been a major part of my life, from my familyâ€™s first Apple IIe to building my own computers and provisioning Linux based servers.

I love web development. What's not to like?

  • An endless supply of new concepts? Check.
  • Continuous learning? Check.
  • New technologies to play with invented every day? Check.
  • Problem solving? Check.

In any industry, there are times that you have to work long hours, complete a tedious task, or toil over a difficult problem. Programming is no exception, but I really enjoy the process of working through an issue to find an elegant solution. I love the feeling of coming away from a task having learned something new, whether it is a skill, a better way of approaching a problem, or a new piece of technology.
